√ran1 'take pleasure'

present: [1.] ráṇati etc.  ráṇanta   -- [4.] ráṇyati etc.  raṇyáthas  

perfect: rāraṇa  rāráṇas etc.  rārán  rārandhí etc.  arāraṇus  

aorist: [3.] arīraṇat  ararāṇat   -- [5.] arāṇiṣus  ráṇiṣṭana  

[future: raṇiṣyati  raṇitā  ]

secondary: intensive: raṅraṇ-   -- desiderative: riraṇiṣa-   -- causative: raṇáyati etc.  raṇáyanta  rāṇayati  

derivatives: rán  ráṇa V.+  ráṇya V.  raṇyà AV.  ránti? V.  rántya V.  ráṇitṛ RV.  raṇvá V.  ráṇvan RV.  

Compare √ram.
